Twin Cinema

06 Mar 2006

Well I was tidying up my joejag files today and uncovered some images from circa 2003/2004. So I hastily made a script that thumbnailed them and put it up here. On a coding note, I think this simplistic approach beats the crap out of all those gallery applications you can get.

And in other news.... I hope you've all heard the Mark Ronson remix of Radiohead's Just?

Ah memories and great tunes redone.

Joe Wright
